parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>TRUE: The post includes a CMF number (CMF 11240002), which is a strong indicator of electoral propaganda in Romania.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>TRUE: The post clearly refers to Gabriel Pană and Maria Gabriela Horga. While it mentions their official roles (Primar and Senator), this is clearly in the context of promoting them as candidates associated with the PNL party.  The image reinforces this by prominently displaying the PNL logo.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>TRUE: This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The targeting data shows a broad reach across several locations in Giurgiu County, Romania.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>TRUE: The visual presentation, including the PNL logo and the candidates' names and titles, strongly suggests the objective is to promote the candidates and influence voters to support them in the upcoming elections. The text "Pentru Familie, Comunitate, Țară" is a common slogan used in political campaigns to appeal to voters.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>FALSE: The post lacks the characteristics of journalistic reporting. It does not present objective information or analysis but rather promotes specific candidates.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>FALSE: The content is not a personal opinion; it's a clearly structured promotional piece for political candidates.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>1460906211256435</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The post fulfills all the criteria for electoral propaganda as defined by Article 36 (7) of LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006. It directly refers to candidates (Gabriel Pană and Maria Gabriela Horga), uses visual elements (PNL logo) and text ("Pentru Familie, Comunitate, Țară") to promote them, targets a wide audience through a paid Facebook campaign, and has a clear electoral objective (influencing voters). The presence of the CMF number further strengthens this conclusion.  The argument against it being propaganda is weak; the mention of their official roles is clearly within the context of promoting their candidacy.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Gabriel Pană</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
  <candidate><name>Maria Gabriela Horga</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>PNL</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Cosmin Radoi, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări pe Facebook (ID 1460906211256435) cu caracter de propagandă electorală, care promovează candidații Gabriel Pană și Maria Gabriela Horga de la PNL, folosind imagini, text și numărul CMF 11240002, având ca efect electoral influențarea votului în favoarea acestora. Postarea, deși menționează funcțiile oficiale ale candidaților, este clar o reclamă electorală, întrunind toate criteriile articolului 36 (7) din LEGE nr. 334 din 17 iulie 2006, și anume: referire directă la candidați, utilizare în perioada post-campanie electorală, obiectiv electoral și adresare publicului larg, depășind limitele activității jurnalistice.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
